entry.title: RT rahat.eth: Happy to announce that as of today I am now Head of Developer Relations at @biconomy. Over the past few months I’ve been thinking about...
entry.summary: RT rahat.eth Happy to announce that as of today I am now Head of Developer Relations at @biconomy. Over the past few months I’ve been thinking about the terrible UX we accept in web3 today. I started doing some front end talks and workshops to talk about common UX patterns in web3 today.

entry.summary:
RT Ahmad Abugosh For my web3 friends 🙏 There are just a few days left to support @Givethio in the @Gitcoin Alpha round. Through the power of quadratic funding, a small amount from you can be amplified to have a big impact!
Giveth - Gitcoin Alpha Round 🌏: We’ve got great things in store for 2023 & we’re working FAST to bring them to you. As we’re largely funded by donations, this @gitcoin Alpha Round is a big one for us! 💜 Please consider supporting our grant: So what's in the works? 🧵👇 https://grant-explorer.gitcoin.co/#/round/1/0xd95a1969c41112cee9a2c931e849bcef36a16f4c/0xb746c0f648f9b930ea4568cf8741067a7fc7eb3928ac13cced8076212cf3cf37-0xd95a1969c41112cee9a2c931e849bcef36a16f4c

entry.title: RT Push DAO: Excited to welcome our newest grantee @woop_pay 🔔✨ Developed as a collective venture by our frens at @developer_dao and @d_d_agency_w...
entry.summary:
RT Push DAO Excited to welcome our newest grantee @woop_pay 🔔✨ Developed as a collective venture by our frens at @developer_dao and @d_d_agency_web3, Woop Pay is on a mission to simply crypto payments and Push will power useful real time notifications for transactions.
Woop Pay: Woop Pay has partnered with @pushprotocol as part of their grant program to bring you more convenience! Users will receive real-time updates on payment requests with Push notifications, making it easier to keep track of your transactions. Get started at http://wooppay.xyz
